alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Delaware and northern Sullivan Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Downsville, or 13 miles south of Delhi, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waneta Lake, Lewbeach, Russell Brook Campsite, Beaverkill Campground and Wolf Hollow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
